member.name: T:Syncfusion.DiagramUtilityAssembly
member.summary: This class holds the name of the Syncfusion.Diagram.Windows assembly and provides a helper routine that helps with resolving types when loading a serialization stream and when the framework probes for assemblies by reflection.

member.summary: A reference to the for the grid assembly.

member.summary: The root namespace of this assembly. Used internally for locating resources within the assembly.

member.summary: Assemblies the resolver.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

members.member: The Binder class helps with the resolution of Diagram types between different versions of the Syncfusion assemblies.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DiagramUtilityAssembly.Binder.BindToType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, controls the binding of a serialized object to a type.
member.param: Specifies the name of the serialized object.
Specifies the name of the serialized object.
member.returns: The type of the object the formatter creates a new instance of.

member.summary: Redrawing locking calls counter. Allow to ignore unneeded control (un)locking.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.RichTextBoxAdv.m_iEventMask
member.summary: Special mask of Richedit control. It stored by BeginUpdate method and required for proper unlocking. User must not change it.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.RichTextBoxAdv.BeginUpdate
member.summary: Lock control updating till proper call of EndUpdate Method. Each call of BeginUpdate must be corresponding EndUpdate, otherwise control redrawing will be locked

member.summary: UnLock control update

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter
member.summary: The VisioStencilConverter is a utility class that converts Visio stencil files (*.vss files) into Essential Diagram symbol palettes (*.edp files). Each shape in the stencil file will have a equivalent in the . The symbol palette may directly be consumed by diagramming applications, and symbols created from the symbol models.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Directory used to store Converer temorary files.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.#ctor(System.String,System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.Convert
member.summary: Converts the Visio stencil into an Essential Diagram symbol palette.
member.returns: The instance generated from the stencil.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the VisioStencilConverter.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.TemporaryDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indcating whether temporary directory used by Visio converter to store temp files.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.ShowProgressDialog
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a progress dialog should be displayed during the conversion.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Forms.Diagram.VisioStencilConverter.IgnoreStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the fill styles specified for the Visio shapes will be applied to the diagram symbols.
member.remarks: When the IgnoreStyles property is set to its default value of TRUE the Visio shape fill values will not be extended to the diagram symbolmodel, and the symbols will retain the default fill values.
